title: Office Performance PC
short: Fast, quiet multitasking for Microsoft 365, dozens of tabs, and daily reliability.
description: Professional office workstation for productivity. Emphasis on stability, quietness, and responsive multitasking with dozens of browser tabs and Microsoft 365 applications.

tiers.name: Value
tiers.target: Microsoft 365, email, web browsing, video calls
notes: Quiet cooling and stable BIOS profiles matter more than raw power.
Fanless or low-RPM components reduce office noise.
Plenty of RAM (32GB) ensures smooth multitasking with many browser tabs.
